title: Business Analyst/Project Manager
description:
About Us

Gigmo Solutions Pvt. Ltd is a fast-growing organization with global experience in the Information Technology and Services industry. We have a presence in several countries across the Americas, Europe, Africa, and Asia. With expertise in languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian, German, and global English, our aim is to transform the customer support domain by leveraging a curated Gig workforce and cutting-edge AI technologies. As a Microsoft Partner, we provide technical support to our clients.

Role And Responsibilities


As a Business Analyst/ Project Manager, you will be responsible for conducting exploratory and evaluative research, including feature analysis, competitor analysis, and concept testing.
Provide a clear and compelling product vision and strategy based on market understanding, customer needs, and business goals.
Facilitate requirement gathering, solution design, and propose the best solutions for software development projects.
Contribute to iterative product development and finalization, ensuring the deliverables meet quality standards.
Write and own the project requirements, including functional specifications, use cases, user stories, and workflow/process diagrams.
Create work breakdown structures and timelines, evaluate risks, and conduct user acceptance testing.
Act as a liaison between business stakeholders and the project team, ensuring effective communication and addressing concerns.
Monitor project progress, manage deliverables, and resolve issues that may arise during the project.
Close the project by ensuring all deliverables are completed, conducting a post-project review, and transitioning ongoing responsibilities.


Candidate Qualifications


Experience: 9 to 14 years in Project Management or Business Analysis roles.
Strong communication, leadership, and decision-making skills.
Ability to understand product, users, and business context.
Research skills, including requirements gathering, analysis, and wireframing.
Proficiency in Project Management tools like MS Project, JIRA, etc.
Strong organizational and planning skills with the ability to multitask.
High level of motivation and self-starting attitude.
Experience in people management and issue resolution.
PM certification like PMI or PRINCE2 is a plus.


Required Skills


Passion
Drive
Communication
Leadership
Decision-making
